title: Large Bright Unit w/ Garage Parking, Cross Golden Gate Park
posting_body: Don't miss this large one bedroom corner unit with garage parking and Ocean view, over looking the Golden Gate Park across the street, and within short distance to Outer Richmond Safeway and Ocean Beach.
Easy reach to San Francisco University (SFU) via Fulton Street bus line.
Available immediately.
Features include:
1) 1 large Bedroom and one large living room.
Hardwood floors throughout the apartment.
2) There is a ding area off living room.
Kitchen has two door refrigerator, gas range and new tile floors.
3) New toilet, and new tile floors in bathroom.
4) One car garage space included.
5) Newly installed central heating for the unit.
One year lease required.
Tenant pays PGE, landlord pays water and garbage.
One cat or small dog is negotiable.
Non-smokers please.
Move in cost: first month rent plus security deposit.
Please call/text Ming Zhang
show contact info
for viewing appointments/more information.
6350 Fulton St #3 (cross 40th Ave)

This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.
